about.text: Set within the verdant pine and oak tree forest of Mljet National Park, Hotel Odisej Mljet is just two hours by passenger or car ferry from Dubrovnik.

rooms.description:
Many rooms have balconies that beckon you to
breathe in the pure Mediterranean air of the island.
All rooms are air conditioned and feature an
elegant ensuite bathroom with shower.

roomsList.superiorRoomDescription: Enjoy a sublime stretch of gently shaded waterfront next to Pomena pier, where all the yachts and ships dock.
roomsList.deluxeRoomDescription: Overlooking the neatly lined boats at the very pretty Pomena marina, Levanat Pizzeria has enchanting views over the crystal-clear Adriatic.
roomsList.familyRoomDescription: The picture perfect panorama of Pomena Bay from the terrace draws a steady crowd to Restaurant Odisej.

park.oakForestTitle:
Oak tree forest of Mljet National Park Oak tree forest of
Mljet National Park

footer.description: Experience the beauty of the Adriatic with unmatched comfort and timeless elegance.

vistaMare.title: Vista Mare Beach Bar
vistaMare.description: Enjoy a sublime stretch of gently shaded waterfront next to Pomena pier, where all the yachts and ships dock.

levanat.description: Overlooking the neatly lined boats at the very pretty Pomena marina, Levanat Pizzeria has enchanting views over the crystal-clear Adriatic.

odisej.title: Restaurant Odisej
odisej.description: The picture perfect panorama of Pomena Bay from the terrace draws a steady crowd to Restaurant Odisej.

wellness.text1: Massage, sauna sessions, beauty treatments such as pedicures and manicures, a fitness room with cardio and strength equipment, an outdoor children's pool filled with sea water or a sun terrace to relax on.
wellness.text2: Energy Clinic is an exclusive international center for the well-being of body, mind and inner self, focusing on revitalization and restoration of energy and the feeling of complete relaxation, balance and enjoyment.
wellness.text3: Energy Clinic restores and relaxes your physical and inner self through a unique fusion of contemporary Western and Traditional Chinese Medicine.
wellness.text4: With that in mind, we offer various unique treatments and manufacture our own premium line of homegrown organic cosmetic products. We also use and re-sell high-end health and beauty brands such as Sisley, Babor, Decleor, Thalgo and others.
wellness.text5: Our holistic approach to health and well-being even includes education – we run a successful wellness academy, providing extensive theoretical and practical know-how for a whole generation of tomorrow’s wellness, beauty, and health specialists.
